summary: Frontend-only testing of multi-tenant drag and drop CMS for school websites. Focused on drag & drop, save, and preview functionality. Core UI elements loading correctly, authentication working, but drag and drop testing incomplete due to browser technical issues.

testing_limitations.issue: Browser crashed during drag and drop testing with SIGSEGV error
testing_limitations.impact: Unable to complete full drag and drop workflow testing

potential_drag_drop_issues.issue: Could not verify drag and drop functionality due to browser crash during testing

passed_tests: Editor interface loading with widgets sidebar and canvas
14 widgets found and properly displayed in sidebar
Editor canvas loading with existing content
Widgets sidebar with proper widget categories (Hero Section, Text Block, Heading, etc.)
Existing demo content renders correctly (hero section, features)
UI layout and styling appears professional and functional
success_percentage: Frontend: 70% (UI loads correctly, auth works, but core drag & drop functionality untested)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Verify drag and drop functionality works properly. Test: 1) Drag widget from sidebar to canvas adds component, 2) Save button saves page with new components, 3) Preview page displays saved components correctly, 4) Preview button navigates to preview page, 5) Edit Page button navigates back to editor. The browser crash suggests potential compatibility or resource issues during drag operations.
